name: SmartTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open smart trivia”
”Alexa, ask Smart Trivia select Movie Trivia”
”Alexa, search Smart Trivia for English Vocabulary”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart trivia
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Smart Trivia offers trivia games in a variety of subjects using questions that are fun and engaging. Each game adapts to your skill level quickly and offers questions that are just right for you. The more you play, the better you get! In each game, your performance is tracked using a rating that is a mesaure of how good you are right now, how much you are improving and how your current skill level compares to those of other users.

Smart Trivia offers a robust free version. In addition, paid subscription offers:

- Up to four user profiles, each tracked separately. Perfect for a family or a college dorm!
- More advanced quesstions and skill levels.

All versions offer dynamic content: questions are updated frequently.

In-skill Interaction Examples:
“Alexa, select English Vocabulary”
“Alexa, select Movie Trivia”
“Alexa, select US History”
“Alexa, select Countries of the World”
“Alexa, help”
“Alexa, repeat”
“Alexa, start over”
“Alexa, stop”
“Alexa, change user”
"Alexa, set a daily reminder for 7.00 PM"
"Alexa, cancel daily reminders"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
